meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Pearson Becky Giardina Mary Beth Hammerstrom Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6715.

td.p: John Pearson, a 4th grade math teacher from Richardson, Texas (subtotal of $15,200)
Becky Giardina, a 7th grade social studies teacher from Martinez, Georgia (subtotal of $0)
Mary Beth Hammerstrom, a high school social studies teacher from Anchorage, Alaska (subtotal of $11,000)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: You\'re all pretty good at math, so all you had to do is figure out a country that came into being in 1947.)
BeckyWhat is Israel?
$8,000
Mary BethWhat is Pakistan?
$10,800
JohnWhat is I Love You, Drew!
$0
Pakistan')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In England in 1933, Choudhry Rahmat Ali coined this name, a country that wouldn\'t be formed until 14 years later')

tr.td: In England in 1933, Choudhry Rahmat Ali coined this name, a country that wouldn't be formed until 14 years later

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
